name: Lost Paradise (itch)
description:
Lost Paradise is a tower defense.
Your goal is to protect your base, by killing enemies.
In order to save your home, you shall build towers.

Each tower can be upgraded in multiples ways: you have 3 elements that fit in 2 slots.
Your job is to merge elements to create synergy and discover those effects.

This project has been made in 3 weeks in a group of 9 students.
